body: That was good but things went down a bit too neatly for my liking. When he decided to merge with the princess' soul I expected there to be some sort of backlash but nothing happened. What was the point of driving her soul out if he was just going to absorb it again anyway? also, I get that the princess is a puppet ruler for the arch-mage but wtf was stopping him or his henchman from doing it themselves? how did they know the random guy wouldn't betray them or use it against them?  ehh, it's fine but after the first one, this was a major let down  in terms of writing.
this power sends really fun, stealing my mom and sisters' bodies and making us all have lesbian sex would be amazing
